Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT")
if UnitOnTaxi("player") then GameTooltip:SetText(TAXI_CANCEL,1,1,1) GameTooltip:AddLine(TAXI_CANCEL_DESCRIPTION,1,1,1,true) else GameTooltip:AddLine(LEAVE_VEHICLE,1,1,1) end
GameTooltip:Show()

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT")
if UnitOnTaxi("player") then GameTooltip:SetText(TAXI_CANCEL, 1,1,1) GameTooltip:AddLine(TAXI_CANCEL_DESCRIPTION, 1,1,1, true) end
GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnShow:
for i = 1, 3 do local bar = self["Bar"..i]
bar.FadeIn:Stop() end
self.FadeIn:Play()
if self.SlideIn:IsPlaying() then self.SlideIn:Stop() end self.SlideIn:Play()

Scripts.OnLoad:
local frame = ZoneAbilityFrame
frame:SetParent(self) frame:ClearAllPoints() frame:SetPoint("CENTER") frame.SetPoint = function() end frame:SetFrameLevel(self:GetFrameLevel()-1)
self:SetScale(0.8) SyncUI_RegisterDragFrame(self,SYNCUI_STRING_PLACEMENT_TOOL_LABEL_ZONE_ABILITY)
for i = 1, 10 do local token = self["Token"..i] token:SetStatusBarColor(0.6,0.2,1) end
for i = 1, 10 do local token = self["Token"..i] token:SetStatusBarColor(0,0.4,0.9) end
for i = 1, 10 do local token = self["Token"..i] token:SetStatusBarColor(1.0,0.35,0.0) end
Scripts.OnClick:
if button == "LeftButton" then TogglePVPUI() elseif button == "RightButton" then
end

Scripts.OnEnter:
local free = 0 for i = 0, 4 do free = free + GetContainerNumFreeSlots(i) end
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOP",0,10) GameTooltip:AddLine(INVENTORY_TOOLTIP.." "..format(NUMBER_IN_PARENTHESES, free),1,1,1) GameTooltip:Show()
